title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19ยง 80.9 - Public notice
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 19ยง 80.9 - Public notice

State Regulations

The records access officer shall cause public notice to be
posted in all buildings occupied by the department, informing members of the
public of his business location and telephone number; the time and place
records will be made available for inspection and copying; and the notice shall
inform the individual of his right to appeal the denial of access to requested
records and provide him with the name, business address and telephone number of
the records appeals officer. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 19ยง
80.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
